      • filterOverflow

        public int filterOverflow(double index1,
                 double index2,
                 double index3,
                 int red_init,
                 int blue_init,
                 int green_init)
        This method checks if the resulting value from the formula is greater than 255 (white color) so that there will be no need to hold greater values
        Parameters:
        index1 - specific coefficient for red color
        index2 - specific coefficient for green color
        index3 - specific coefficient for blue color
        red_init - the initial value of the red color before processing
        blue_init - the initial value of the green color before processing
        green_init - the initial value of the blue color before processing
        Returns:
        The value that a color of the pixel needs to have after the Sepia filter
